version_description: A complete redesign with the ability to watch msnbc live (your cable provider credentials required). In addition to The Rachel Maddow Show, the following shows are now available on demand: All In with Chris Hayes, Caught on Camera, Hardball, Lockup, Politics Nation, The Last Word with Lawrence O'Donnell, UP with Steve Kornacki.
maintenance release
maintenance release
Maintenance release

•  Complete app redesign makes it easier to find and enjoy your favorite shows.
•  Stream msnbc shows to your TV or monitor using Apple Airplay.
•  Bug fixes and performance improvements.

•  Full Airplay support.
•  Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Full Chromecast support
• Watch videos in either portrait or landscape orientation
• One-click 10-second rewind
• Syncs with your password manager for faster login
• Refreshed design
• Seamless integration with social networks to let you share videos instantly

- Enhancements to caching
- Fixed miscellaneous bugs

- Enhancements to the video player
- Ability to toggle between days on the live/schedule page
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Support for iPhone X
• Performance enhancements to the video player
• General bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes
We've redesigned our homepage and made it easier to find the shows you love most!
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Fixed in this version:
-Video Player Screen Jumps When Controls Disappear

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Fixed in this version:
-Homepage shelves were intermittently not displaying or taking time to appear

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Fixed: 
-Progress tracking wasn’t being captured correctly if the video was stopped and started more than once.
-Fully watched videos were ending up in the Continue Watching section.
Added: 
-Progress tracking begins when user has watched more than 1% of the video.

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Changed: 
-Moved the episode information below the video - making it easier to quickly find what you're looking for.

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Changed: 
-We made enhancements to Google Chromecast.
All caught up on your favorite show? We've improved our end card experience making it easier for you to find new shows!
